summary: This document contains a series of financial transactions involving Zorro Management, LLC, and various individuals, primarily related to payments for ranch hand services. The payments are made through Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and detail the amounts, dates, and recipients.

persons.name: Leon Ortiz
persons.context: Leon Ortiz is mentioned multiple times as a recipient of payments for ranch hand services.

connections.description: Leon Ortiz is employed by Zorro Management, LLC as a ranch hand, receiving payments for his services.
Gilbert Gonzalez is employed by Zorro Management, LLC as a ranch hand, receiving payments for his services.

Daniel Gutierrez is employed by Zorro Management, LLC as a ranch hand, receiving payments for his services.
Anthony Silva is mentioned in relation to a payment made by Zorro Management, LLC for the purchase of a horse.

keyFacts: The document contains multiple checks issued by Zorro Management, LLC to various individuals for ranch hand services.
Payments are consistently noted at a rate of $12.00 per hour for ranch hand work.
Leon Ortiz, Gilbert Gonzalez, and Quinonez-Bojorquez Juanrene are the most frequently mentioned recipients of payments.
The checks are issued through Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The document includes various dates for the payments, primarily in late 2017.
